promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young basic sea-snake water-type pokemon wearing a dark crystal headband. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or sea-snake. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Riverserpentium, a a young basic sea-snake water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: Prop-up Pinchers. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "sea-snake", "water" or "Riverserpentium". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, sea-snake-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, teal and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Gentle in flow and forceful in battle, this aqua serpent thrives in rivulets. Its Prop-up Pinchers aid both in battle and catching river bait.
